body_html:
@harshini-gadige I tried with the gcc and bazel versions you specified but faced the following error:
ERROR: /home/armaan/.cache/bazel/_bazel_armaan/68a0964576af93b9dcbb773eca5ca492/external/com_google_absl/absl/base/BUILD.bazel:58:1: C++ compilation of rule '@com_google_absl//absl/base:dynamic_annotations' failed (Exit 1)
gcc-4.8: error trying to exec 'cc1plus': execvp: No such file or directory
Target //tensorflow/tools/pip_package:build_pip_package failed to build
Use --verbose_failures to see the command lines of failed build steps.
